nodes.text: The Useani camnzin was apparently a creature native to the planet Usean II. The camnzin was said to be a mountain dweller responsible for wiping out several herbivorous species. In reality, it was a hoax perpetrated by Wilek Nereus. Nereus collected animal teeth, including a set from a herbivore from Usean II, the lrashtash. the teeth were often mistaken as those of a predator, so it amused Nereus to invent a species for his own entertainment.
